info.title: BoldSign
info.description: BoldSign is a secure, easy-to-use electronic signature solution that provides legally binding ways to send, sign, and manage documents.

post.summary: Send document using template with recipient
post.description: Send a document out for signature using a specified template to a recipient.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: Select Template

parameters.name: isSandbox
parameters.description: When enabled, BoldSign will send signature requests in sandbox mode, allowing you to test the integration

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Enter document title

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Enter document description

parameters.name: cc
parameters.description: Enter one or more email addresses separated by comma

parameters.name: brandId
parameters.description: Select Brand

parameters.name: onBehalfOf
parameters.description: Select an email address to send on behalf of another person

parameters.name: expiryDays
parameters.description: Please provide the number of days after which the document will expire

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Provide one or more labels for the document, separated by commas

parameters.name: hideDocumentId
parameters.description: When enabled, the ID imprint will be hidden at the top of the document

parameters.name: enablePrintAndSign
parameters.description: When allowed, the signer will be able to print and sign the document

parameters.name: enableReassign
parameters.description: When allowed, the signer will be able to reassign the document to others

parameters.name: enableAutoReminder
parameters.description: When enabled, BoldSign will send automated reminder emails at the specified frequency

parameters.name: signers
parameters.description: The signers of the document.

get.description: Downloads the PDF file of the given document ID.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: Provide document ID

parameters.name: onBehalfOf
parameters.description: Select an email address to perform the action on behalf of another person

get.description: Download the audit trail of a completed document.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: Provide document ID

parameters.name: onBehalfOf
parameters.description: Select an email address to perform the action on behalf of another person

get.description: Retrieve a list of available templates.
Retrieves the document status and its information of a document.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: Provide document ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of available brands.
Gets dynamic signers based on selected template.
Retrieve a list of available sender identities (Used to send and manage on behalf of another person).

Location.description: Location URL that can be used to unsubscribe the webhook

parameters.name: events
parameters.description: Select webhook event to which flow should be triggered.

adminMode.description: Enable this option to receive notifications for events triggered by your team members. Account admins will also receive notifications for events across the entire organization. If disabled, you will only receive notifications for your own events.
adminMode.title: Team user's events

delete.description: This unsubscribes the webhook that configured for a trigger.

TemplateDynamicSigners.description: An dynamic signer object computed based on the selected template.

SendDocumentFromTemplateResponse.description: The response object of the template send document request.

documentId.description: The ID of the document created.

DocumentPropertiesResponse.description: The response object of the document properties request.

status.description: The status and other information of the document

TemplateListResponse.description: The response object of the template list request.

activityDate.description: The last activity date on the document

activityBy.description: Details of last person performed an activity on the document

enableAccessCode.description: Indicates whether access code enabled or not

enableEmailOTP.description: Indicates whether email OTP enabled or not

allowRoleEdit.description: Indicates whether role edit is allowed or not

allowRoleDelete.description: Indicates whether role delete is allowed or not

enableSigningOrder.description: Indicates whether signing order enabled or not

enableReassign.description: Indicates whether reassign is enabled or not

isTemplate.description: Indicates whether it is template or not

BrandListResponse.description: The response object of the brand list request.

isDefault.description: Indicates whether the brand is default or not

canHideTagLine.description: Indicates whether tag line can be hide or not

combineAuditTrail.description: Indicates whether audit trail combined or not

excludeAuditTrail.description: Indicates whether audit trail excluded or not

showBuiltInFormFields.description: Indicates whether built-in form fields can be show or not

allowCustomFieldCreation.description: Indicates whether custom field creation is allowed or not

showSharedCustomFields.description: Indicates whether shared custom fields can be showed or not

hideDecline.description: Indicates whether decline button can be hide or not

hideSave.description: Indicates whether save button can be save or not

SenderIdentityListResponse.description: The response object of the sender identity (on behalf of) list request.

createdBy.description: The sender identity created by email

viewed.description: The viewed notification enabled or not

sent.description: The sent notification enabled or not

deliveryFailed.description: The delivery failed notification enabled or not

declined.description: The declined notification enabled or not

revoked.description: The revoked notification enabled or not

reassigned.description: The reassigned notification enabled or not

completed.description: The completed notification enabled or not

signed.description: The signed notification enabled or not

expired.description: The expired notification enabled or not

authenticationFailed.description: The authentication failed notification enabled or not

reminders.description: The reminders notification enabled or not

AddWebHooksResponse.description: The response object of the subscribe webhook request.

enableAccessCode.description: Indicates whether access code enabled or not

isAuthenticationFailed.description: Indicates whether authentication failed or not

enableEmailOTP.description: Indicates whether email OTP enabled or not

isDeliveryFailed.description: Indicates whether document delivery failed or not

isViewed.description: Indicates whether document viewed or not

isReassigned.description: Indicates whether signer reassigned or not

requireLiveCapture.description: Indicates whether live capture required or not

requireMatchingSelfie.description: Indicates whether matching selfie required or not

allowFieldConfiguration.description: Indicates whether field configuration required or not

enableSigningOrder.description: Indicates whether signing order enabled or not

disableEmails.description: Indicates whether emails are disabled or not

isCombinedAudit.description: Indicates whether audit trail is combined with document or not
